In 1985 the Savigni started a butcher's shop and after a short time they realized that it was necessary to open a farm in order to have quality meat. In 2004 a cured meat factory was also created with the idea of having a controlled supply chain.   The reference mountain chain of this VC is Northern Apennines - Tuscan Emilian Apennines. The great number of certifications and the collaboration with other farms of the territories.   The environment is essential. The Savigni family works in an authentic setting: the passing of the seasons, the good water of Porretta and the clear one of the Suviana Lake. The closed cycle of production of the Savigni takes place mainly outdoors, because those animals put out to pastures in a wild state are healthier and guarantee a better quality of meat.    The main challenge is to maintain a high quality supply ,using only local animal ,with an increasing international market demand. Overall the type of challenge faced by this VC is Predicted. This VC is classified as Innovative.   The type of innovation of this VC (Value Chain) is Endogenous. The innovation was to belive in the organic farm when nobody take care to it and to consider the certificatin not just as a sort of brand but as the possibility to enter in new and qualified market.
